full_text: wat, 2 Be Tipo 2017/KER/49765 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA FRIDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2017/17TH AGRAHAYANA, 1939 Cr1l.MC.No. 6729 of 2017 () CRIME NO. 348/2015 OF KODUVALLY POLICE STATION , KOZHIKODE PETITIONER/DEFACTO COMPLATINANT.: ANEES, s/o. HAMSA HAJI, AGED 27 YEARS, KUNNUMMAL HOUSE, PARAPPANPOYIL P.O, THAMARASSERY, KOZHIKODE. BY ADV. SRI.NIRMAL. S RESPONDENT (S) /STATE & ACCUSED: 1. STATE OF KERALA, RP. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-~-682031 2. SHAKKIR, AGED 26 YEARS, S/O. MOIDU, PARALLAL, AVILORA P.O, KOZHIKODE-673001 3. RIYAS, AGED 24 YEARS, S/O. SAITHALI, KAPPALANKUZHIYIL, VAVAD P.O, KOZHIKODE-673001 4. ABDURAHIMAN, AGED 24 YEARS, S/O. MUHAMMED, KANNADTPOYIL, VAVAD P.O, KOZHTKODE-673001. 5. ANAS, AGED 26 YEARS, S/O. MUHAMMED, MATLANDIKKARAMMAL, VAVAD P.O, KOZHTKODE-673001 6. IBRAHIM, s/o. AHAMMEDRKUTTY MALIKATHADATHIL, VAVAD P.O, KOZHIKODE-673001 R1 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI ALEX M THOMBRA R2 TO R6 BY ADV. SRI.P.K.NIJOY THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08-12-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: K.V. wat, Be rp aasas 2017/KER/49765 Cr1.MC.No. 6729 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO. 348/2015 DATED 29.07.2015. ANNEXURE A2 TRUE COPY OF THE NOTARISED AFFIDAVIT DATED 03.04.2017 FILED BY THE DE FACTO COMPLAINANT. RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS NIL / TRUE copy/ K.V. P.S.TO JUDGE BED 2017/KER/49765 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 8" day of December, 2017 ORDER Petitioner is the de facto complainant and respondents 2 to 6 are the accused in Crime No.348/2015 of Koduvally Police Station, registered for the offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 341, 427, 307 and 395 read with Section 149 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably settled between the petitioner, who is the de _ facto complainant and respondents 2 to 6, who are the accused. 3. Petitioner, who is the de facto complainant, has filed Annexure-A2 affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between him and the accused and presently, he has no- complaints against the accused/respondents 2 to 6. When the matter has been amicably settled between the parties, no purpose would be Dee Aa ie 2017/KER/49765 Crl.M.C.6729/2017 :2: served in proceeding with the matter any further. Matters being so, Annexure-A1 First Information Report in Crime No.348/2015 of Koduvally Police Station and all further proceedings as against respondents 2 to 6 in it, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and Annexure-A1 First Information Report in Crime No.348/2015 of Koduvally Police Station and all further proceedings as against respondents 2 to 6 in it, are quashed. Sd/- (B-KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/08/12 // True Copy / PS to Judge
